title: Geraint Thomas, Egan Bernal ‘hungry for the win’ for Ineos Grenadiers at Vuelta a España
content:
Ineos Grenadiers come out swinging in quest to win its first grand tour in two years with Arensman, Ganna also part of blockbuster selection.

Read the full article at Geraint Thomas, Egan Bernal ‘hungry for the win’ for Ineos Grenadiers at Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
